column6: Great happy medium between traditional and matte lipstick
column9: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2017
column14: One of my favorite lip colors!  The color is a very nice rosy brown, and I think it strikes a nice balance between pink and brown. However, I agree with the other reviewer that it is definitely darker in real life than it is in this photo (which is either good or bad depending on your preference).

column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2019
column14: I really love this lipstick.  It stays on for hours and acts as a liner and lipstick in one.  Holds its shape, and no sharpening required.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2019
column14: Lorac is he only lip color I wear, and this doesn't disappoint.  The dusty rose is a very flattering color.

column6: Rosewood is a pretty color though
column9: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2018
column14: Am I mistaken or did this lipstick have a minty scent before? I believe I had the Rose color a few years back and I lost it unfortunately. I just ordered the Rosewood and it has no scent at all. The tube seems thinner as well. Rosewood is a pretty color though.

column6: My go to! Will buy more!
column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2020
column14: Found this no smudge color beautiful no dry lips!

column9: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2019
column14: The lip color is amazing and this lipstick goes on smooth and is not sticky. It stays for a long period of time too! I had lost my first one on vacation and bought this one right after I figured out I lost it. Can't go without it!

column9: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2020
column14: The color was perfect looked like the sample.

column6: Very smooth application and nice early on
column9: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2017
column14: Very smooth application and nice early on, but tends to look a little dry later. I've been using this plus a gloss to complement one another and am happy with the look. A bit dark, best for evening or a more stark look.
